title: Super Pepper To The Rescue!
description: When Lilyanna decides to face her fear of the dark in the spooky forest, she doesn't expect to get lost. But when she does, her cuddly kitty with super powers comes to her rescue. Super Pepper to the Rescue is a magical little tale that will make you smile and have your kids asking you to read it over and over again.
author: J.A. Sparkle
